This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test that query rejects if it doesn't get a configuration 
PASS Test that query rejects if the MediaConfiguration isn't valid 
FAIL Test that query returns a valid MediaDecodingAbility objects promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Failed to execute 'query' on 'MediaCapabilities': required member contentType is undefined."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
